question: How can a player obtain the Mastercrafted silver sword (basic) in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt?
answer: A player can obtain the Mastercrafted silver sword (basic) by killing the ice giant during The Lord of Undvik. It can also be found as random loot or purchased from merchants such as all blacksmiths in Velen, Novigrad, Oxenfurt, and Skellige; a merchant at Calveit Watchtower; a merchant at the Isolated Hut on Hindarsfjall; a merchant by the road west of White Eagle Fort; a weapons merchant in Nilfgaardian Army Group 'Center' Camp; Zoltan Chivay during The Battle of Kaer Morhen (dependent); and a merchant in Stacheier.
